com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.behaviors

Class Evade<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.SteeringBehavior<T>
      • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.behaviors.Pursue<T>
        • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.behaviors.Evade<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of vector, either 2D or 3D, implementing the Vector interface

    public class Evade<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
extends Pursue<T>
    Evade behavior is almost the same as Pursue except that the agent flees from the estimated future position of the pursuer. Indeed, reversing the acceleration is all we have to do.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Evade

        public Evade(Steerable<T> owner,
             Steerable<T> target)
        Creates a Evade behavior for the specified owner and target. Maximum prediction time defaults to 1 second.
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner of this behavior
        target - the target of this behavior, typically a pursuer.

      • Evade

        public Evade(Steerable<T> owner,
             Steerable<T> target,
             float maxPredictionTime)
        Creates a Evade behavior for the specified owner and pursuer.
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner of this behavior
        target - the target of this behavior, typically a pursuer
        maxPredictionTime - the max time used to predict the pursuer's position assuming it continues to move with its current velocity.

    • Method Detail

      • getActualMaxLinearAcceleration

        protected float getActualMaxLinearAcceleration()
        Description copied from class: Pursue
        Returns the actual linear acceleration to be applied. This method is overridden by the Evade behavior to invert the maximum linear acceleration in order to evade the target.
        Overrides:
        getActualMaxLinearAcceleration in class Pursue<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>

      • setLimiter

        public Evade<T> setLimiter(Limiter limiter)
        Sets the limiter of this steering behavior. The given limiter must at least take care of the maximum linear acceleration.
        Overrides:
        setLimiter in class Pursue<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
        Returns:
